ygData.subject: Re: Sad Encounter
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve kept an emergency kit for quite a while.  I used it recently when D Vinn trashed me for daring to step across the zone into Crushbone.  My kit was a
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:25 PM 6/4/99 -0700, Rokenn of Karana wrote:
>On a side note, I keep a spare drum and flute (acutally mino horn) in the
>bank. The drum for those long runs back and the mino horn so I can use my
>invis song in hostile areas.

I've kept an emergency kit for quite a while. I used it recently when
D'Vinn trashed me for daring to step across the zone into Crushbone. My
kit was a backpack with 5 milk, 5 muffins, a tarnished bastard sword, and a
leather tunic. The sword is my normal spare. The tunic was left when I
got my banded.

But that wasn't enough. It was stinking pitch black dark at the Crushbone
zone, on both sides. I hadn't noticed because I normally carry a light
stone. So I went back and bought a large lantern which is now in the kit.
Later I bought a spare drum to add.

Nothing like having to use it to teach you what you need.

Thrush
